verses.text_uthmani: قٓ ۚ وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ٱلْمَجِيدِ

translations.text: Qãf. By the glorious Quran!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaf walqur-ani almajeed
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: بَلْ عَجِبُوٓا۟ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٌ مِّنْهُمْ فَقَالَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ هَـٰذَا شَىْءٌ عَجِيبٌ

translations.text: ˹All will be resurrected,˺ yet the deniers are astonished that a warner has come to them from among themselves ˹warning of resurrection˺. So the disbelievers say, “This is an astonishing thing!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Bal AAajiboo an jaahum munthirunminhum faqala alkafiroona hatha shay-onAAajeeb
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا ۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجْعٌۢ بَعِيدٌ

translations.text: ˹Will we be returned to life,˺ when we are dead and reduced to dust? Such a return is impossible.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: A-itha mitna wakunna turabanthalika rajAAun baAAeed
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَدْ عَلِمْنَا مَا تَنقُصُ ٱلْأَرْضُ مِنْهُمْ ۖ وَعِندَنَا كِتَـٰبٌ حَفِيظٌۢ

translations.text: We certainly know what the earth consumes of them ˹after their death˺, and with us is a well-preserved Record.<sup foot_note=77400>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qad AAalimna ma tanqusual-ardu minhum waAAindana kitabun hafeeth
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: بَلْ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِٱلْحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمْ فَهُمْ فِىٓ أَمْرٍ مَّرِيجٍ

translations.text: In fact, they reject the truth when it has come to them, so they are in a confused state.<sup foot_note=77401>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Bal kaththaboo bilhaqqilamma jaahum fahum fee amrin mareej
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَفَلَمْ يَنظُرُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَوْقَهُمْ كَيْفَ بَنَيْنَـٰهَا وَزَيَّنَّـٰهَا وَمَا لَهَا مِن فُرُوجٍ

translations.text: Have they not then looked at the sky above them: how We built it and adorned it ˹with stars˺, leaving it flawless?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Afalam yanthuroo ila assama-ifawqahum kayfa banaynaha wazayyannahawama laha min furooj
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلْأَرْضَ مَدَدْنَـٰهَا وَأَلْقَيْنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِىَ وَأَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوْجٍۭ بَهِيجٍ

translations.text: As for the earth, We spread it out and placed upon it firm mountains, and produced in it every type of pleasant plant—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wal-arda madadnahawaalqayna feeha rawasiya waanbatnafeeha min kulli zawjin baheej
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: تَبْصِرَةً وَذِكْرَىٰ لِكُلِّ عَبْدٍ مُّنِيبٍ

translations.text: ˹all as˺ an insight and a reminder to every servant who turns ˹to Allah˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Tabsiratan wathikralikulli AAabdin muneeb
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَنَزَّلْنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً مُّبَـٰرَكًا فَأَنۢبَتْنَا بِهِۦ جَنَّـٰتٍ وَحَبَّ ٱلْحَصِيدِ

translations.text: And We send down blessed rain from the sky, bringing forth gardens and grains for harvest,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wanazzalna mina assama-imaan mubarakan faanbatna bihi jannatinwahabba alhaseed
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلنَّخْلَ بَاسِقَـٰتٍ لَّهَا طَلْعٌ نَّضِيدٌ

translations.text: and towering palm trees ˹loaded˺ with clustered fruit,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wannakhla basiqatinlaha talAAun nadeed
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: رِّزْقًا لِّلْعِبَادِ ۖ وَأَحْيَيْنَا بِهِۦ بَلْدَةً مَّيْتًا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلْخُرُوجُ

translations.text: ˹as˺ a provision for ˹Our˺ servants. And with this ˹rain˺ We revive a lifeless land. Similar is the emergence ˹from the graves˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Rizqan lilAAibadi waahyaynabihi baldatan maytan kathalika alkhurooj
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَأَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلرَّسِّ وَثَمُودُ

translations.text: Before them, the people of Noah denied ˹the truth,˺ as did the people of the Water-pit,<sup foot_note=77402>1</sup> Thamûd,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kaththabat qablahum qawmu noohinwaas-habu arrassi wathamood
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَعَادٌ وَفِرْعَوْنُ وَإِخْوَٰنُ لُوطٍ

translations.text: ’Ȃd, Pharaoh, the kinfolk of Lot,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WaAAadun wafirAAawnu wa-ikhwanuloot
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْأَيْكَةِ وَقَوْمُ تُبَّعٍ ۚ كُلٌّ كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ وَعِيدِ

translations.text: the residents of the Forest,<sup foot_note=77403>1</sup> and the people of Tubba’.<sup foot_note=77404>2</sup> Each rejected ˹their˺ messenger, so My warning was fulfilled.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waas-habu al-aykati waqawmutubbaAAin kullun kaththaba arrusula fahaqqawaAAeed
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَفَعَيِينَا بِٱلْخَلْقِ ٱلْأَوَّلِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِى لَبْسٍ مِّنْ خَلْقٍ جَدِيدٍ

translations.text: Were We incapable of creating ˹them˺ the first time? In fact, they are in doubt about ˹their˺ re-creation.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: AfaAAayeena bilkhalqial-awwali bal hum fee labsin min khalqin jadeed
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ وَنَعْلَمُ مَا تُوَسْوِسُ بِهِۦ نَفْسُهُۥ ۖ وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنْ حَبْلِ ٱلْوَرِيدِ

translations.text: Indeed, ˹it is˺ We ˹Who˺ created humankind and ˹fully˺ know what their souls whisper to them, and We are closer to them than ˹their˺ jugular vein.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad khalaqna al-insanawanaAAlamu ma tuwaswisu bihi nafsuhu wanahnu aqrabuilayhi min habli alwareed
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِذْ يَتَلَقَّى ٱلْمُتَلَقِّيَانِ عَنِ ٱلْيَمِينِ وَعَنِ ٱلشِّمَالِ قَعِيدٌ

translations.text: As the two recording-angels—˹one˺ sitting to the right, and ˹the other to˺ the left—note ˹everything˺,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ith yatalaqqa almutalaqqiyaniAAani alyameeni waAAani ashshimali qaAAeed
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: مَّا يَلْفِظُ مِن قَوْلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيْهِ رَقِيبٌ عَتِيدٌ

translations.text: not a word does a person utter without having a ˹vigilant˺ observer ready ˹to write it down˺.<sup foot_note=77405>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ma yalfithu min qawlinilla ladayhi raqeebun AAateed
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَجَآءَتْ سَكْرَةُ ٱلْمَوْتِ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنتَ مِنْهُ تَحِيدُ

translations.text: ˹Ultimately,˺ with the throes of death will come the truth.<sup foot_note=77406>1</sup> This is what you were trying to escape!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wajaat sakratu almawti bilhaqqithalika ma kunta minhu taheed
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَنُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْوَعِيدِ

translations.text: And the Trumpet will be blown.<sup foot_note=77407>1</sup> This is the Day ˹you were˺ warned of.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wanufikha fee assoori thalikayawmu alwaAAeed
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَجَآءَتْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ مَّعَهَا سَآئِقٌ وَشَهِيدٌ

translations.text: Each soul will come forth with an angel to drive it and another to testify.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wajaat kullu nafsin maAAaha sa-iqunwashaheed
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَّقَدْ كُنتَ فِى غَفْلَةٍ مِّنْ هَـٰذَا فَكَشَفْنَا عَنكَ غِطَآءَكَ فَبَصَرُكَ ٱلْيَوْمَ حَدِيدٌ

translations.text: ˹It will be said to the denier,˺ “You were totally heedless of this. Now We have lifted this veil of yours, so Today your sight is sharp!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Laqad kunta fee ghaflatin min hathafakashafna AAanka ghitaaka fabasarukaalyawma hadeed
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ هَـٰذَا مَا لَدَىَّ عَتِيدٌ

translations.text: And one’s accompanying-angel will say, “Here is the record ready with me.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqala qareenuhu hatha maladayya AAateed
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَلْقِيَا فِى جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٍ

translations.text: ˹It will be said to both angels,˺ “Throw into Hell every stubborn disbeliever,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Alqiya fee jahannama kulla kaffarinAAaneed
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: مَّنَّاعٍ لِّلْخَيْرِ مُعْتَدٍ مُّرِيبٍ

translations.text: withholder of good, transgressor, and doubter,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: MannaAAin lilkhayri muAAtadin mureeb
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَأَلْقِيَاهُ فِى ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلشَّدِيدِ

translations.text: who set up another god with Allah. So cast them into the severe punishment.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Allathee jaAAala maAAa Allahiilahan akhara faalqiyahu fee alAAathabiashshadeed
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ قَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ رَبَّنَا مَآ أَطْغَيْتُهُۥ وَلَـٰكِن كَانَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍۭ بَعِيدٍ

translations.text: One’s ˹devilish˺ associate will say, “Our Lord! I did not make them transgress. Rather, they were far astray ˹on their own˺.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala qareenuhu rabbana maatghaytuhu walakin kana fee dalalinbaAAeed
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ لَا تَخْتَصِمُوا۟ لَدَىَّ وَقَدْ قَدَّمْتُ إِلَيْكُم بِٱلْوَعِيدِ

translations.text: Allah will respond, “Do not dispute in My presence, since I had already given you a warning.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala la takhtasimooladayya waqad qaddamtu ilaykum bilwaAAeed
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: مَا يُبَدَّلُ ٱلْقَوْلُ لَدَىَّ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ بِظَلَّـٰمٍ لِّلْعَبِيدِ

translations.text: My Word cannot be changed,<sup foot_note=77408>1</sup> nor am I unjust to ˹My˺ creation.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ma yubaddalu alqawlu ladayya wamaana bithallamin lilAAabeed
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَوْمَ نَقُولُ لِجَهَنَّمَ هَلِ ٱمْتَلَأْتِ وَتَقُولُ هَلْ مِن مَّزِيدٍ

translations.text: ˹Beware of˺ the Day We will ask Hell, “Are you full ˹yet˺?” And it will respond, “Are there any more?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yawma naqoolu lijahannama hali imtala/tiwataqoolu hal min mazeed
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأُزْلِفَتِ ٱلْجَنَّةُ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ غَيْرَ بَعِيدٍ

translations.text: And Paradise will be brought near to the righteous, not far off.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waozlifati aljannatu lilmuttaqeena ghayrabaAAeed
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: هَـٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِكُلِّ أَوَّابٍ حَفِيظٍ

translations.text: ˹And it will be said to them,˺ “This is what you were promised, for whoever ˹constantly˺ turned ˹to Allah˺ and kept up ˹His commandments˺—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Hatha ma tooAAadoona likulliawwabin hafeeth
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: مَّنْ خَشِىَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنَ بِٱلْغَيْبِ وَجَآءَ بِقَلْبٍ مُّنِيبٍ

translations.text: who were in awe of the Most Compassionate without seeing ˹Him˺,<sup foot_note=77409>1</sup> and have come with a heart turning ˹only to Him˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Man khashiya arrahmanabilghaybi wajaa biqalbin muneeb
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱدْخُلُوهَا بِسَلَـٰمٍ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْخُلُودِ

translations.text: Enter it in peace. This is the Day of eternal life!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Odkhulooha bisalamin thalikayawmu alkhulood
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيْنَا مَزِيدٌ

translations.text: There they will have whatever they desire, and with Us is ˹even˺ more.<sup foot_note=77410>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Lahum ma yashaoona feehawaladayna mazeed
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَكَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّن قَرْنٍ هُمْ أَشَدُّ مِنْهُم بَطْشًا فَنَقَّبُوا۟ فِى ٱلْبِلَـٰدِ هَلْ مِن مَّحِيصٍ

translations.text: ˹Imagine˺ how many peoples We destroyed before them, who were far mightier than them. Then ˹when the torment came,˺ they ˹desperately˺ sought refuge in the land. ˹But˺ was there any escape?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wakam ahlakna qablahum min qarnin humashaddu minhum batshan fanaqqaboo fee albiladi halmin mahees
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكْرَىٰ لِمَن كَانَ لَهُۥ قَلْبٌ أَوْ أَلْقَى ٱلسَّمْعَ وَهُوَ شَهِيدٌ

translations.text: Surely in this is a reminder for whoever has a ˹mindful˺ heart and lends an attentive ear.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna fee thalika lathikraliman kana lahu qalbun aw alqa assamAAawahuwa shaheed
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فِى سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ وَمَا مَسَّنَا مِن لُّغُوبٍ

translations.text: Indeed, We created the heavens and the earth and everything in between in six Days,<sup foot_note=77411>1</sup> and We were not ˹even˺ touched with fatigue.<sup foot_note=77412>2</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad khalaqna assamawatiwal-arda wama baynahuma fee sittatiayyamin wama massana min lughoob
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ قَبْلَ طُلُوعِ ٱلشَّمْسِ وَقَبْلَ ٱلْغُرُوبِ

translations.text: So be patient ˹O Prophet˺ with what they say. And glorify the praises of your Lord before sunrise and before sunset.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fasbir AAala mayaqooloona wasabbih bihamdi rabbika qabla tulooAAiashshamsi waqabla alghuroob
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَأَدْبَـٰرَ ٱلسُّجُودِ

translations.text: And glorify Him during part of the night<sup foot_note=77413>1</sup> and after the prayers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wamina allayli fasabbihhu waadbaraassujood
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱسْتَمِعْ يَوْمَ يُنَادِ ٱلْمُنَادِ مِن مَّكَانٍ قَرِيبٍ

translations.text: And listen! On the Day the caller will call out from a near place,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WastamiAA yawma yunadi almunadimin makanin qareeb
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَوْمَ يَسْمَعُونَ ٱلصَّيْحَةَ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْخُرُوجِ

translations.text: the Day all will hear the ˹mighty˺ Blast in ˹all˺ truth,<sup foot_note=77414>1</sup> that will be the Day of emergence ˹from the graves˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yawma yasmaAAoona assayhatabilhaqqi thalika yawmu alkhurooj
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْىِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَإِلَيْنَا ٱلْمَصِيرُ

translations.text: It is certainly We Who give life and cause death. And to Us is the final return.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna nahnu nuhyeewanumeetu wa-ilayna almaseer
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَوْمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلْأَرْضُ عَنْهُمْ سِرَاعًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ حَشْرٌ عَلَيْنَا يَسِيرٌ

translations.text: ˹Beware of˺ the Day the earth will split open, letting them rush forth. That will be an easy gathering for Us.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yawma tashaqqaqu al-ardu AAanhum siraAAanthalika hashrun AAalayna yaseer
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: نَّحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ ۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيْهِم بِجَبَّارٍ ۖ فَذَكِّرْ بِٱلْقُرْءَانِ مَن يَخَافُ وَعِيدِ

translations.text: We know best what they say. And you ˹O Prophet˺ are not ˹there˺ to compel them ˹to believe˺. So remind with the Quran ˹only˺ those who fear My warning.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Nahnu aAAlamu bima yaqooloonawama anta AAalayhim bijabbarin fathakkir bilqur-animan yakhafu waAAeed
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
